title: feeling stooged and a little ripped off by ranked servers going down early imo
body:
i was scrambling last minute to finish my climb in ranked TFT as well as trying to complete as much of the TFT beta pass as i could. i was making steady progress with plenty of 1st place and top 4 finishes. after coming 1st in a ranked TFT match, the game concluded and i received a message stating my party was disbanded for scheduled maintenance to be performed. this happened between 11.00pm and 11.30pm Brisbane, AUSTRALIA time. tuesday night 5th november 2019.

i checked the status page and this is what i read;

Oceania
Game
Online
Network Operations â€“ 11:50 AM
On 06/11/19, starting at 04:30 Sydney Time (17:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 9.22. At 06:00 Sydney Time (19:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

sydney is only 1 hour ahead of brisbane, meaning 11.30pm tuesday in brisbane would be 12.30am wednesday in sydney.

i feel like ranked que went down 4 hours earlier than it was scheduled.

so that's my little rant of annoyance, as i lost the last 3 hours i had planned to play and was only 1 win away from acheiving my goal of reaching GOLD.

sadface

p.s yes i know there was days, weeks, months to play TFT ranked, but there was also other things going on in the game and community and in life in general, plus trying to learn the game to be confident enough to play ranked and also keep up with the metas etc.

but saying that ranked ends on a certain day and time and then cutting it short isn't ideal for the player, you've given us a time so we know what we have to work with, which is awesome to have that knowledge, but then it gets taken away from you, and any progress u made seems like a massive waste of time that you've invested. :(

replies.body:
The ranked season for TFT ended tonight at midnight server time (11 Brisbane time). I'm not entirely sure why they ended the season before the other queues went down for maintenance, but I would imagine it's to keep it consistent with ranked seasons ending at midnight (and it falls on a patch day for other reasons) and also potentially stop the maintenance from interfering with a season end level event.

>TFT - Ranked Season and Beta Pass 3 end Tuesday night at Midnight. Make sure you finish everything you want to!
[- Riot Mort](https://twitter.com/Mortdog/status/1191056572660641792)

I will say the original announcement was more than a bit misleading with "The Teamfight Tactics ranked season ends when the game comes down for patch 9.22".

yeah a bit misleading for sure, because yeah ranked ended hours before the game was scheduled to go down for the patch and also ranked isn't coming back for a couple of weeks, so i don't know why they rushed to end it. also the beta pass 3 is still going and says it still has another 24 hours give or take to go. so the info is all over the placee and royally screwed me over. thanks for the reply

ok so now the beta pass is gone, so we got stooged 24 hours on that one too, was planning on collecting the last orb that i charged up to finish it, what a shit show from riot and there is more scheduled maintenance at 3am to 6am 2moro? so server down 2 days in a row it seems.
I also feel a little miffed by this, living on the Gold Coast and having the game go according to Sydney time is quite annoying.
pps every other game mode, aram, urf and SR including ranked solo and flex all remained, only ranked TFT was taken down.
